text: Jeron Criswell King (August 18, 1907 - October 4, 1982), born Jeron Criswell Konig, and known by his stage-name The Amazing Criswell , was an American psychic known for making wrong predictions. In person, he went by Charles Criswell King, and was sometimes credited as Jeron King Criswell. He was born in Princeton, Indiana. Criswell was a friend of director Ed Wood and narrated in his famous movie Plan 9 from Outer Space. Criswell died of cardiac arrest in Burbank, California, aged 75. ==Other websites== * * *"Criswell Predicts" -- The Onion A.V. Club, August 11, 1999 *Photos of Criswell's grave at Findagrave *"The Amazing Criswell" Tribute page Category:1907 births Category:1982 deaths Category:Deaths from cardiac arrest Category:American voice actors Category:American television actors Category:Actors from Indiana
title: The Amazing Criswell
